# predicates

**Instance Property**

An array of sample predicates that define the type of data that the query returns.

## Declaration

```swift
var predicates: [HKSamplePredicate<Sample>] { get set }
```

## Discussion

To query for multiple types of data, provide a sample predicate for each type. If your [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSamplePredicate] instances return different [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSample] subclasses, use [doc://com.apple.healthkit/documentation/HealthKit/HKSamplePredicate/sample(type:predicate:)] to create the sample predicates.

## Accessing Query Properties

- **limit**: The maximum number of samples that the query returns.
- **sortDescriptors**: An array that specifies the order of the results that the query returns.
